com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app
Interface Droid4mizerInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
Droid4mizer
public interface Droid4mizerInterface

Enables to define a common additional contract when extending an Activity which is to be droid4mized.

Since:
2011.06.14
Author:
Édouard Mercier
